author: desruisseaux
msg: Referencing: add projection subtypes (Cylindrical, Conic, Planar or Azimuthal).

author: orudyy
msg: NO-JIRA: Make system test synchronous receive timeout configurable and increase it on derby profiles in order to avoid sporadic test failures on slow boxes due to elapsed timeout

author: baedke
msg: OAK-2803: RepositoryUpgrade.copy() doesn't create correct templates for residual item definitions

author: markt
msg: Ensure that when an updated class file is detected that the JspLoader that loaded the old class file is cleared so a new JspLoader can load the new version of the class
